item.title: @elonmusk: Was lucky to get early access to grok imagine API Made my best short film yet! Model was CRAZY fast ...
item.description: Was lucky to get early access to grok imagine API Made my best short film yet! Model was CRAZY fast - like 10x > Sora & Veo - which let me crank this thing out in 2 days. Watch with SOUND ON ğŸ”Š Shoutout to@forwardeployand@xaiteam - keep a look for their cameos of@jimmybajimmyba@TobyPhln@TheGregYang@Yuhu_ai_@Guodzh@TobyPhlnand of course@elonmuskFollow for the sequel!

item.title: @elonmusk: Tested the new Grok Imagine video editing model. I'm impressed - it's a really fast, easy, and preci...
item.description: Tested the new Grok Imagine video editing model. I'm impressed - it's a really fast, easy, and precise! It does a great job of segmenting what you want to change while leaving the rest of the clip consistent. A few examples, original is on the left and edit on the rightğŸ‘‡

item.title: @elonmusk: Did you know that Grok Imagine has the most scale in AI image generation? It generated over 5.5 bill...
item.description: Did you know that Grok Imagine has the most scale in AI image generation? It generated over 5.5 billion images within 30 days surpassing competitors like DALLÂ·E, LeonardoAi, Midjourney or Google Veo.

item.title: @elonmusk: Good morning my friends. I want to take a moment to tell you how much I appreciate each one of you. ...
item.description: Good morning my friends. I want to take a moment to tell you how much I appreciate each one of you. Hope you enjoy my first 10 sec Grok video. ğŸ’•#Tuesday_Vibes

item.title: @elonmusk: NEWS: X announces partnership with Warner Bros Discovery for the 2026 Winter Olympics in Milano Cort...
item.description: NEWS: X announces partnership with Warner Bros Discovery for the 2026 Winter Olympics in Milano Cortina. The deal brings exclusive Olympics content to X users in Europe and the UK, with brands getting access to in-game clips via X's Amplify offering.

item.title: @elonmusk: Amazing and typical chart. The entire argument for mass migration, of course, rests on the assumptio...
item.description: Amazing and typical chart. The entire argument for mass migration, of course, rests on the assumption that all or most migrants WILL positively contribute to society. But, this....isn't true.

item.title: @elonmusk: Sebastian Gomez-Pena, who is paralysed from the neck down, is one of the first people in the UK to r...
item.description: Sebastian Gomez-Pena, who is paralysed from the neck down, is one of the first people in the UK to receive Elon Muskâ€™s brain chip. "It's magical," he tells Sky's@t0mclark3, "it's cool to see that when I think about moving my hand something actually happens."

item.title: @elonmusk: BREAKING: Elon Musk has just confirmed that Grok Imagine is now generating more images & videos than...
item.description: BREAKING: Elon Musk has just confirmed that Grok Imagine is now generating more images & videos than everyone else combined.

item.title: @elonmusk: BREAKING: House Republicans just introduced the â€œMake Elections Great Againâ€ Act. The MEGA Act would...
item.description: BREAKING: House Republicans just introduced the â€œMake Elections Great Againâ€ Act. The MEGA Act would: - Require photo ID to vote - Require citizenship verification to register to vote - Require states use paper ballots for federal elections - Voter roll maintenance requirements - Requires mail in ballots be received on election day - Bans ballot harvesting - Bans ranked choice voting - Bans Universal vote by mail - Bans partisan voter initiatives

item.title: @elonmusk: SpaceX is now providing precise positional awareness of objects in Earth orbit to all satellite oper...
item.description: SpaceX is now providing precise positional awareness of objects in Earth orbit to all satellite operators for free. This will greatly reduce the probability of collisions that create orbital debris (space junk) hazards.

item.title: @elonmusk: Proud of the groundbreaking work the@starlinkteam is doing to advance space safety. With Stargaze, w...
item.description: Proud of the groundbreaking work the@starlinkteam is doing to advance space safety. With Stargaze, we have the beginnings of the space traffic system needed to ensure safe satellite operations.
